name: Trek to Jungle - 3 day, SaPa
description: The flora is diverse Fansipan. Up to 1,680 plants divided into 7 groups of 679 spent. There are some rare heading. Foothills are the rice plant, jackfruit, often struggling with relatively thick density of sites created Coc Leu (cup rice), Coc San (Bangkok Mit) etc. From here to a height of 700 m is the tropical belt ties dense primeval forest, brushwood. From 700 m upwards are gymnosperms as pơmu floor, there are three plants, four hug people Xue, 50-60 m high, several hundred years old. From 2,800 m altitude, the ground is covered with dwarf bamboo, the bamboo thickets low 25-30 cm, both bare stems, leaves the tops with a little stream, so this species is called architecture  whisk. Interspersed are some of the them as sedge plants, roses, imperial ventures.
